abilities.adaptability: Powers up moves of the same type.
abilities.aerilate: Turns Normal-type moves into Flying-type moves.
abilities.aftermath: Damages the attacker landing the finishing hit.
abilities.analytic: Boosts move power when the Pokémon moves last.
abilities.anger_point: Maxes Attack after taking a critical hit.
abilities.anger_shell: Lowers Defense/Sp. Def and raises Attack/Sp. Atk/Speed when HP drops below half.
abilities.aroma_veil: Protects allies from attacks that limit their move choices.
abilities.as_one: Combines Unnerve and Chilling Neigh/Grim Neigh
abilities.aura_break: Reduces power of Dark- and Fairy-type moves.
abilities.ball_fetch: Retrieves a Poké Ball from a failed throw.
abilities.battery: Raises power of teammates' Special moves.
abilities.battle_armor: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.
abilities.battle_bond: Transform into Ash-Greninja after causing opponent to faint.
abilities.beads_of_ruin: Lowers Special Defense of all Pokémon except itself.
abilities.beast_boost: The Pokémon boosts its most proficient stat each time it knocks out a Pokémon.
abilities.berserk: Raises Special Attack when HP drops below half.
abilities.big_pecks: Protects the Pokémon from Defense-lowering attacks.
abilities.blaze: Powers up Fire-type moves in a pinch.
abilities.bulletproof: Protects the Pokémon from ball and bomb moves.
abilities.cheek_pouch: Restores additional HP when a Berry is consumed.
abilities.chilling_neigh: Boosts Attack after knocking out a Pokémon.
abilities.chlorophyll: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in sunshine.
abilities.clear_body: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.
abilities.color_change: Changes the Pokémon's type to the foe's move.
abilities.comatose: The Pokémon is always asleep but can still attack.
abilities.commander: Goes inside the mouth of an ally Dondozo if one is on the field.
abilities.competitive: Sharply raises Special Attack when the Pokémon's stats are lowered.
abilities.contrary: Makes stat changes have an opposite effect.
abilities.corrosion: The Pokémon can poison Steel and Poison types.
abilities.costar: Copies ally's stat changes on entering battle.
abilities.cud_chew: Can eat the same Berry twice.
abilities.curious_medicine: Resets all stat changes upon entering battlefield.
abilities.cursed_body: May disable a move used on the Pokémon.
abilities.cute_charm: Contact with the Pokémon may cause infatuation.
abilities.damp: Prevents the use of self-destructing moves.
abilities.dark_aura: Raises power of Dark type moves for all Pokémon in battle.
abilities.dazzling: Protects the Pokémon from high-priority moves.
abilities.defeatist: Lowers stats when HP drops below half.
abilities.defiant: Sharply raises Attack when the Pokémon's stats are lowered.
abilities.delta_stream: Creates strong winds when the ability activates.
abilities.desolate_land: Turns the sunlight extremely harsh when the ability activates.
abilities.download: Adjusts power according to a foe's defenses.
abilities.drizzle: The Pokémon makes it rain when it enters a battle.
abilities.drought: Turns the sunlight harsh when the Pokémon enters a battle.
abilities.dry_skin: Reduces HP if it is hot. Water restores HP.
abilities.early_bird: The Pokémon awakens quickly from sleep.
abilities.earth_eater: Restores HP when hit by a Ground-type move.
abilities.effect_spore: Contact may poison or cause paralysis or sleep.
abilities.electric_surge: The Pokémon creates an Electric Terrain when it enters a battle.
abilities.electromorphosis: Doubles power of the next Electric-type move when hit by an attack.
abilities.emergency_exit: Switches out when HP falls below 50%.
abilities.fairy_aura: Raises power of Fairy type moves for all Pokémon in battle.
abilities.flame_body: Contact with the Pokémon may burn the attacker.
abilities.flare_boost: Powers up special attacks when burned.
abilities.flash_fire: It powers up Fire-type moves if it's hit by one.
abilities.flower_gift: Powers up party Pokémon when it is sunny.
abilities.flower_veil: Prevents lowering of ally Grass-type Pokémon's stats.
abilities.fluffy: Halves damage from contact moves, but doubles damage from Fire-type moves.
abilities.forewarn: Determines what moves a foe has.
abilities.frisk: The Pokémon can check a foe's held item.
abilities.full_metal_body: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.
abilities.galvanize: Normal-type moves become Electric-type moves and their power boosted.
abilities.gluttony: Encourages the early use of a held Berry.
abilities.gooey: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.
abilities.gorilla_tactics: Boosts the Pokémon's Attack stat but only allows the use of the first selected move.
abilities.grass_pelt: Boosts the Defense stat in Grassy Terrain.
abilities.grassy_surge: The Pokémon creates a Grassy Terrain when it enters a battle.
abilities.grim_neigh: Boosts Special Attack after knocking out a Pokémon.
abilities.guard_dog: Boosts Attack if intimidated, and prevents being forced to switch out.
abilities.gulp_missile: Returns with a catch in its mouth after using Surf or Dive.
abilities.guts: Boosts Attack if there is a status problem.
abilities.hadron_engine: Creates an Electric Terrain when entering battle, and boosts Special Attack while active.
abilities.harvest: May create another Berry after one is used.
abilities.healer: May heal an ally's status conditions.
abilities.heatproof: Weakens the power of Fire-type moves.
abilities.honey_gather: The Pokémon may gather Honey from somewhere.
abilities.hustle: Boosts the Attack stat, but lowers accuracy.
abilities.hydration: Heals status problems if it is raining.
abilities.hyper_cutter: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering Attack stat.
abilities.ice_body: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in a hailstorm.
abilities.ice_face: Avoids damage from Physical moves for one turn.
abilities.illuminate: Raises the likelihood of meeting wild Pokémon.
abilities.illusion: Enters battle disguised as the last Pokémon in the party.
abilities.immunity: Prevents the Pokémon from getting poisoned.
abilities.imposter: It transforms itself into the Pokémon it is facing.
abilities.infiltrator: Passes through the foe's barrier and strikes.
abilities.inner_focus: The Pokémon is protected from flinching.
abilities.insomnia: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.
abilities.iron_barbs: Inflicts damage to the Pokémon on contact.
abilities.iron_fist: Boosts the power of punching moves.
abilities.justified: Raises Attack when hit by a Dark-type move.
abilities.keen_eye: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering accuracy.
abilities.klutz: The Pokémon can't use any held items.
abilities.leaf_guard: Prevents problems with status in sunny weather.
abilities.levitate: Gives immunity to Ground type moves.
abilities.libero: Changes the Pokémon's type to its last used move.
abilities.lightning_rod: Draws in all Electric-type moves to up Sp. Attack.
abilities.limber: The Pokémon is protected from paralysis.
abilities.lingering_aroma: Contact changes the attacker's Ability to Lingering Aroma.
abilities.liquid_ooze: Damages attackers using any draining move.
abilities.liquid_voice: All sound-based moves become Water-type moves.
abilities.long_reach: The Pokémon uses its moves without making contact with the target.
abilities.magic_guard: Protects the Pokémon from indirect damage.
abilities.magician: The Pokémon steals the held item of a Pokémon it hits with a move.
abilities.magma_armor: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming frozen.
abilities.marvel_scale: Ups Defense if there is a status problem.
abilities.mega_launcher: Boosts the power of aura and pulse moves.
abilities.merciless: The Pokémon's attacks become critical hits if the target is poisoned.
abilities.mimicry: Changes type depending on the terrain.
abilities.minus: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.
abilities.misty_surge: The Pokémon creates a Misty Terrain when it enters a battle.
abilities.mold_breaker: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.
abilities.moody: Raises one stat and lowers another.
abilities.motor_drive: Raises Speed if hit by an Electric-type move.
abilities.moxie: Boosts Attack after knocking out any Pokémon.
abilities.multiscale: Reduces damage when HP is full.
abilities.multitype: Changes type to match the held Plate.
abilities.mummy: Contact with this Pokémon spreads this Ability.
abilities.mycelium_might: Status moves go last, but are not affected by the opponent's ability.
abilities.natural_cure: All status problems heal when it switches out.
abilities.neuroforce: Powers up moves that are super effective.
abilities.neutralizing_gas: Neutralizes abilities of all Pokémon in battle.
abilities.no_guard: Ensures attacks by or against the Pokémon land.
abilities.normalize: All the Pokémon's moves become the Normal type.
abilities.opportunist: Copies stat boosts by the opponent.
abilities.orichalcum_pulse: Turns the sunlight harsh when entering battle, and boosts Attack while active.
abilities.overcoat: Protects the Pokémon from weather damage.
abilities.overgrow: Powers up Grass-type moves in a pinch.
abilities.own_tempo: Prevents the Pokémon from becoming confused.
abilities.parental_bond: Allows the Pokémon to attack twice.
abilities.pastel_veil: Prevents the Pokémon and its allies from being poisoned.
abilities.perish_body: When hit by a move that makes direct contact, the Pokémon and the attacker will faint after three turns unless they switch out of battle.
abilities.pickpocket: Steals an item when hit by another Pokémon.
abilities.pickup: The Pokémon may pick up items.
abilities.pixilate: Turns Normal-type moves into Fairy-type moves.
abilities.plus: Ups Sp. Atk if another Pokémon has Plus or Minus.
abilities.poison_heal: Restores HP if the Pokémon is poisoned.
abilities.poison_point: Contact with the Pokémon may poison the attacker.
abilities.poison_touch: May poison targets when a Pokémon makes contact.
abilities.power_construct: Changes form when HP drops below half.
abilities.power_of_alchemy: The Pokémon copies the Ability of a defeated ally.
abilities.power_spot: Just being next to the Pokémon powers up moves.
abilities.prankster: Gives priority to a status move.
abilities.pressure: The Pokémon raises the foe's PP usage.
abilities.primordial_sea: Makes it rain heavily when the ability activates.
abilities.propeller_tail: Ignores moves and abilities that draw in moves.
abilities.protean: Changes the Pokémon's type to its last used move.
abilities.protosynthesis: Raises highest stat in harsh sunlight, or if holding Booster Energy.
abilities.psychic_surge: The Pokémon creates a Psychic Terrain when it enters a battle.
abilities.punk_rock: Boosts sound-based moves and halves damage from the same moves.
abilities.purifying_salt: Protects from status conditions and halves damage from Ghost-type moves.
abilities.quark_drive: Raises highest stat on Electric Terrain, or if holding Booster Energy.
abilities.quick_feet: Boosts Speed if there is a status problem.
abilities.rain_dish: The Pokémon gradually regains HP in rain.
abilities.rattled: Bug, Ghost or Dark type moves scare it and boost its Speed.
abilities.receiver: Inherits an ally's ability when it faints.
abilities.reckless: Powers up moves that have recoil damage.
abilities.refrigerate: Turns Normal-type moves into Ice-type moves.
abilities.regenerator: Restores a little HP when withdrawn from battle.
abilities.rivalry: Deals more damage to a Pokémon of same gender.
abilities.rks_system: Changes type depending on held item.
abilities.rock_head: Protects the Pokémon from recoil damage.
abilities.rough_skin: Inflicts damage to the attacker on contact.
abilities.run_away: Enables a sure getaway from wild Pokémon.
abilities.sand_force: Boosts certain moves' power in a sandstorm.
abilities.sand_rush: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in a sandstorm.
abilities.sand_spit: Creates a sandstorm when hit by an attack.
abilities.sand_stream: The Pokémon summons a sandstorm in battle.
abilities.sand_veil: Boosts the Pokémon's evasion in a sandstorm.
abilities.sap_sipper: Boosts Attack when hit by a Grass-type move.
abilities.scrappy: Enables moves to hit Ghost-type Pokémon.
abilities.screen_cleaner: Nullifies effects of Light Screen, Reflect, and Aurora Veil.
abilities.seed_sower: Turns the ground into Grassy Terrain when the Pokémon is hit by an attack.
abilities.serene_grace: Boosts the likelihood of added effects appearing.
abilities.shadow_shield: Reduces damage when HP is full.
abilities.shed_skin: The Pokémon may heal its own status problems.
abilities.sheer_force: Removes added effects to increase move damage.
abilities.shell_armor: The Pokémon is protected against critical hits.
abilities.shield_dust: Blocks the added effects of attacks taken.
abilities.shields_down: Changes stats when HP drops below half.
abilities.skill_link: Increases the frequency of multi-strike moves.
abilities.slush_rush: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed stat in a hailstorm.
abilities.sniper: Powers up moves if they become critical hits.
abilities.snow_warning: The Pokémon summons a hailstorm in battle.
abilities.solar_power: In sunshine, Sp. Atk is boosted but HP decreases.
abilities.soul_heart: Raises Special Attack when another Pokémon faints.
abilities.speed_boost: Its Speed stat is gradually boosted.
abilities.stakeout: Deals double damage to Pokémon switching in.
abilities.stall: The Pokémon moves after all other Pokémon do.
abilities.stalwart: Ignores moves and abilities that draw in moves.
abilities.stance_change: Changes form depending on moves used.
abilities.static: Contact with the Pokémon may cause paralysis.
abilities.steadfast: Raises Speed each time the Pokémon flinches.
abilities.steam_engine: Drastically raises Speed when hit by a Fire- or Water-type move.
abilities.steely_spirit: Powers up ally Pokémon's Steel-type moves.
abilities.stench: The stench may cause the target to flinch.
abilities.sticky_hold: Protects the Pokémon from item theft.
abilities.storm_drain: Draws in all Water-type moves to up Sp. Attack.
abilities.strong_jaw: Boosts the power of biting moves.
abilities.sturdy: It cannot be knocked out with one hit.
abilities.suction_cups: Negates all moves that force switching out.
abilities.super_luck: Heightens the critical-hit ratios of moves.
abilities.supreme_overlord: Attack and Special Attack are boosted for each party Pokémon that has been defeated.
abilities.swarm: Powers up Bug-type moves in a pinch.
abilities.sweet_veil: Prevents the Pokémon and allies from falling asleep.
abilities.swift_swim: Boosts the Pokémon's Speed in rain.
abilities.sword_of_ruin: Lowers Defense of all Pokémon except itself.
abilities.symbiosis: The Pokémon can pass an item to an ally.
abilities.synchronize: Passes a burn, poison, or paralysis to the foe.
abilities.tablets_of_ruin: Lowers Attack of all Pokémon except itself.
abilities.tangled_feet: Raises evasion if the Pokémon is confused.
abilities.tangling_hair: Contact with the Pokémon lowers the attacker's Speed stat.
abilities.technician: Powers up the Pokémon's weaker moves.
abilities.telepathy: Anticipates an ally's attack and dodges it.
abilities.teravolt: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.
abilities.thermal_exchange: Raises Attack when hit by a Fire-type move. Cannot be burned.
abilities.thick_fat: Ups resistance to Fire- and Ice-type moves.
abilities.torrent: Powers up Water-type moves in a pinch.
abilities.tough_claws: Boosts the power of contact moves.
abilities.toxic_boost: Powers up physical attacks when poisoned.
abilities.toxic_debris: Scatters poison spikes at the feet of the opposing team when the Pokémon takes damage from physical moves.
abilities.trace: The Pokémon copies a foe's Ability.
abilities.truant: Pokémon can't attack on consecutive turns.
abilities.turboblaze: Moves can be used regardless of Abilities.
abilities.unaware: Ignores any stat changes in the Pokémon.
abilities.unburden: Raises Speed if a held item is used.
abilities.unnerve: Makes the foe nervous and unable to eat Berries.
abilities.unseen_fist: Contact moves can strike through Protect/Detect.
abilities.vessel_of_ruin: Lowers Special Attack of all Pokémon except itself.
abilities.victory_star: Boosts the accuracy of its allies and itself.
abilities.vital_spirit: Prevents the Pokémon from falling asleep.
abilities.volt_absorb: Restores HP if hit by an Electric-type move.
abilities.wandering_spirit: Swaps abilities with opponents on contact.
abilities.water_absorb: Restores HP if hit by a Water-type move.
abilities.water_bubble: Halves damage from Fire-type moves, doubles power of Water-type moves used, and prevents burns.
abilities.water_compaction: Sharply raises Defense when hit by a Water-type move.
abilities.water_veil: Prevents the Pokémon from getting a burn.
abilities.weak_armor: Physical attacks lower Defense and raise Speed.
abilities.well_baked_body: Immune to Fire-type moves, and Defense is sharply boosted.
abilities.white_smoke: Prevents other Pokémon from lowering its stats.
abilities.wimp_out: Switches out when HP drops below half.
abilities.wind_power: Doubles power of the next Electric-type move used, when hit by a wind move.
abilities.wind_rider: Takes no damage from wind moves, and boosts Attack if hit by one.
abilities.wonder_skin: Makes status-changing moves more likely to miss.
abilities.zen_mode: Changes form when HP drops below half.
abilities.zero_to_hero: Transforms into its Hero Form when switching out.
